content.html: When companies come to me wanting to switch to async-first work, they always start by asking about tools. Tools are not where you should start. Start with meeting habits. Ineffective meetings = more meetings Want to go async-first? Get rid of bad meeting habits first.
content.value:
When companies come to me wanting to switch to async-first work, they always start by asking about tools.

Tools are not where you should start. Start with meeting habits.

Ineffective meetings = more meetings

Want to go async-first? Get rid of bad meeting habits first.
